title: Lustig: Episode I Screenplay
description: Episode I Synopsys - "Goodbye America"Lustig attempts to cheat his way out of the country with things getting too hot in prohibition-era Chicago. A decade later, a Secret Service agent attempts to track down Lustig after a prison break.LoglinePursuing cash and beautiful women, Victor Lustig thrives on the gullible and vulnerable, conning all walks of life on both sides of the Atlantic.Series OverviewLustig didn’t just master every scam in the book—he wrote the dаmn book. Lustig worked his way up the social hierarchy, seduced countless women, and even married two at the same time. The season consists of ten episodes, exploring two periods of Victor Lustig’s life—the peak of his success in the 1920s and his downfall in the 1930s.A STORY ABOUT THE SMOOTHEST CON ARTIST EVEL LIVED.
author: Craig Britton
